game.name: You're My Favorite Person
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Spend time with your new best friend! Have fun as it takes you through digital worlds to solve puzzles and collect Perfect Stars! After all, it knows what's best! It knows what's best! It knows what's best.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spend time with your new best friend! Have fun as it takes you through digital worlds to solve puzzles and collect Perfect Stars! After all, it knows what's best! It knows what's best! It knows what's best.
